sentences.en: Above him, in a niche on the wall, sat a tiny veiled Ganesh, the elephant god.
sentences.cn: 在他上方墙上的壁龛里安放着一尊极小的蒙面象头神伽内什的塑像。

sentences.en: According to inner and outer environment, permeating the market strategy NICHE for CABC is then established.
sentences.cn: 在企业内外环境分析的基础上, 制定了长沙铝板厂市场渗入的NICHE战略.

sentences.en: Amanda soon found her niche at the club.
sentences.cn: 阿曼达很快就在俱乐部里找到了一份理想的工作。

sentences.en: Each animal has its ecological niche.
sentences.cn: 每种动物都有自己的生态位.

sentences.en: He eventually found his niche in sports journalism.
sentences.cn: 最后他在体育新闻界找到了理想的工作。

sentences.en: I think we have found a niche in the toy market.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们已经在玩具市场找到了领地。

sentences.en: Madeleine placed it carefully in the rocky niche.
sentences.cn: 玛德琳小心翼翼地把它放在岩石壁龛里.

sentences.en: Many media experts see such all-news channels as part of a general move towards niche marketing.
sentences.cn: 很多传媒专家把这些纯新闻频道看作是朝着细分市场这一大势转变的组成部分。

sentences.en: Phenotype and niche are exchangeable notions.
sentences.cn: 表型与小生境是可以互相替换的概念.

sentences.en: Relaxation of approval authority creates foreign exchange control niche.
sentences.cn: 外商投资创业投资企业审批权下放,容许绕过外汇管制.

sentences.en: She has carved a niche for herself as a comic actor.
sentences.cn: 她作为喜剧演员已经闯出了一片天地。

sentences.en: Simon Lane quickly found his niche as a busy freelance model maker.
sentences.cn: 西蒙·莱恩很快找到了适合自己的位置，成了一名忙碌的模型制作的自由职业者。

sentences.en: Singapore companies should seize these opportunities to carve out a niche for ourselves.
sentences.cn: 新加坡的公司也应抓紧这些机会来为自己争取一席之地.

sentences.en: Small companies can do extremely well if they can fill a specific market niche.
sentences.cn: 如果能填充特定的市场空白，小公司可以发展得相当出色。

sentences.en: The new superconductors look set to carve themselves a useful niche in the world's electrical industries.
sentences.cn: 这种新的超导体看起来很有可能在世界电气工业中占得能够发挥作用的一隅。

sentences.en: The really talented among women would always make their own niche.
sentences.cn: 妇女中真正有才能的人总是各得其所.

sentences.en: The whole research contributes considerably to freeing enterprises from marketing crisis and improvement of NICHE strategy.
sentences.cn: 整个研究过程对于小企业营销危机的解决和NICHE战略理论的完善具有借鉴意义.
